name: NPC Wojak Reaction
description: NPC makes a claim, gets challenged with a question, then goes silent and angry. Used to show when someone's confident statement is challenged in a way they don't like.

text_areas.recommended_text: You can't just add print statements to debug

usage_rules: CONTEXT: NPC makes bold claim, gets simple challenge, becomes silent then angry
CLAIM: Confident/pretentious statement from the NPC (Panel 1)
PANELS 3-4: Silent then angry reaction (no text needed)
TONE: Shows inability to defend an overconfident position
BEST FOR: Exposing gatekeeping, pretentious takes, or unfounded confidence
cultural_context: The NPC Wojak meme shows the 'Non-Player Character' archetype - someone who repeats common talking points without deeper understanding. The format highlights when someone's confident assertion crumbles under the simplest scrutiny.
text_positioning_note: Text goes above the characters' heads in panels 1 and 2. Panels 3 and 4 are reaction panels without text.
